thought: The AI completion actions (action_1 and action_3) currently have empty params which may cause issues. We need to set the 'messages' parameter to use the input data's messages correctly for both classification and reminder generation.
plan: Set 'messages' param in action_1 to '={{$json["messages"]}}' to pass messages to AI for classification.
Set 'messages' param in action_3 to '={{$json["messages"]}}' to pass messages to AI for reminder generation.
Test both AI completion actions to ensure they receive correct inputs and produce expected outputs.
criticism: Without setting 'messages' param, AI actions may not function correctly as they rely on this input field to generate responses.

tool_input.comments: Use AI to classify each commercial entry description by passing messages from input data.
